Package Hotel

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hotel.View
  • public class View
extends java.lang.Object
    The View class handles user interaction and input/output operations for the Hotel Reservation System.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  View.MANAGER_STATE
      Enum representing various manager states for managing hotels.
      static class  View.SIMULATE_BOOKING
      Enum representing various states for simulating booking.
